values: Hey peeps, Im going to be changing my journal to assassins_exist. Just so you guy's know.
You god damn Pennsylvanians take EVERYTHING up the ass! Seriously!

Hey kids! Man I havent been here in ages. Oh well. I finally got my new comp after four months! Now...I don't know what to do with myself! I miss all of you guys!!! Leave comments please, thank you, thank you. Im bored out of my mind. My sister and my mom are being assholes, and my grandma called me a faggot!! I should really get around to killing her...But that is for another entry. My mom called me a "stupid boy." What the fuck is that about? Hmm?? Shes gonna get her ass kicked and Im waiting for the perfect time to explode. At this time I would like to thanks everyone for being there for me when I was all depressed. Thanks Zina, Mindy, Ivy, Heather, and Melissa. You guy's are great. In fact I probably wouldnt be here if it werent for you guy's.<3 <3 <3 <3 Hearts for all of you!@~~}~~ roses even! Sorry I can't say the same about you guy's attempts to stop me from smoking. Thanks for trying tho guys!! *mwuah* I wish I could fly on clouds. What do you think clouds feel like? Maybe they're WHIPPED CREAM!!! Or maybe they're just big balls of water condensed into the atmosphere falling into place in the water cycle... Whatever. Theres an evil monkey that lives in my closet...but..he wasn't always evil... I should post some gay porn in here. That would be tight. Mmm... Well I've worn out my welcome. Don't forget to comment homies!

Its been a while since I've updated. School starts tomorrow, and Im fucking nervous. I havent seen anyone, and they're prolly gonna start some shit. I lost my schedule, and I have to wake up early to get a new one. I hope I see someone in the morning *hands sweat* Im so hungry!, I havent eaten in 3 days!!=x I hope tomorrow goes well...

Wolf ~ Wolves are also regarded as path finders
and teachers. Wolf is represented by the
constellation Sirius, the Dog. In the Zuni tradition the Wolf symbolizes the
direction East. Wolf's Wisdom Includes:
Facing the end of one's cycle with dignity and
courage
Death and rebirth
Spirit teaching
Guidance in dreams and meditations
Instinct linked with intelligence
Social and familial values
Outwitting enemies
Loyalty
Steadfastness
perseverance
Taking advantage of change

If you enjoy this quiz please rate, and I may do
some more!

Animal Spirit Guides ~ Which One Calls To You?
brought to you by Quizilla

Today we went to the movies to see white chicks. Zina and Mindy made my day happy. I havent seen Mindy in forever. The movie was pretty funny. I would go see it again. We walked all that way and Mindy and I wouldnt stop bitching about the heat. I think Zina was getting annoyed...but shh!! dont tell her. We met up with Tyler, Christian, Alan, and Mario, and went to circuit city. When the day was over I was really happy for once. Anything is better than being depressed.

I met this guy Jay online. He is pretty "ok" he gets on my nerves. He brags about everything. I hate when people brag. It makes them sound concieted and I hate concieted people. He wanted to hook up with me but I told him,"long distance relationships dont work out." He really wants to be with me and he even said he would try to visit me when he turns 18. I know it wont happen, and I would rather not get my hopes up. Liz broke up with Theresa again. Theresa was being a bitch when she did. I couldnt believe how mad she was and she even had the nerve to tell Liz that she didnt want to be friends anymore. I told Liz that she bases everything on words alone, and shouldnt because words mean nothing when they arent supported by actions. I am coming to believe that "love" is overrated, but there is still a part of me that wants a commitment. I am sick of admitting it. I hate when people tell me bullshit just so I stop being depressed. If your gonna say something to me make sure you meant it. I hate life. I love you tho Liz.
This summer sux ass. I have nothing to do, and Im lonely as ever. It was all expected but none the less. I dont know where Im going with this...Meh...

Today was...great. My best friend came in from San Antonio. Out of no where I told him I was gay, and he freaked out. I could have swore that he wouldnt be my friend anymore. He was acting all paranoid. I told him everything that he might have wanted to hear. He said, "we have been best friends for years and I wouldnt stop being your friend now." Those werent the words I had expeted. Then I started spazzing. He's still getting used to it, but he accepts it. He said, "I cant believe how much you have changed." Im glad were still friends. Moral of the story: Best friends are there no matter what.

I dont understand. There are so many thoughts in my head. I almost cut my fucking arm off yesterday. Im so stressed right now. I hate to say it yvette, but im gay. Well actually Im fine about it. haha. oh well. and life goes on... My mom is still in denial about this thing, she's gonna have to get over it. OR im just gonna have to torture her. Julie's really cool about it now. Yes...good ol Julie...Im getting happy for some reason...damn. Im not used to this.

My mom and my sister have been treating me like shit because Im gay. I dont even think Im gay anymore,cuz I cant live with the guilt. I think I'll stick with being bi. Whoever comes to me first, as Heather always said. My mom came in and said shit about me not knowing about my sexuality. She said it was upsetting. FUCK THAT!! Im so fucking pissed, I feel like im gonna murder someone in their sleep. Maybe grandma...
Is it right for someone to hold it against you that your shy? I dont get it. Is that so wrong?

This dark forest is too much..
Taking whats left of my black heart with its wraith touch.
The path is narrow; very thin
Paved with rotting sin.
A few cuts, blood as a pool.
In the end, I am the fool.
Secluded in my closet, Nowhere to go.
Cold as Night, I feel my blood flow.
Haunted by your presence I cry.
I am left wandering. Why is it so easy just to die?

I never realized what it would be like to cuddle with someone you love. Heather said, "its the best thing in the world to cuddle." I wouldnt know, but its something I would like to find out. I appreciate all the advice im recieving, from all of my friends. Thanx guys. Life's a bitch and then you die...

There isnt really much to think about today. I cant put everything thats going on in my head together. After I cut yesterday, it seemed everything made me laugh. Everything that I thought about was completely out of my system, and I was really happy. Liz's words really got to me. "Were young, just have fun." I told her, " ya but were not getting any younger." Im just gonna turn my brain off forever. So nothing can hurt me.

I talk to heather a lot and she has helped me with a lot of problems. Im glad I met her. Maybe we will get to meet in person one day. At least I would hope so. She showed me that there are a lot more people out there for me. She thinks im cute which I still think is bullshit. I really appreciate her telling me tho, it helps my self-esteem a lot. I have never really been truly happy until. This time I didnt need material items. Suprisingly Jon just called me. I dont know what the hell is going on with him. I thought that if I stopped calling him that he wouldnt call me. He never calls me! Now he just calls me out of nowhere. What the fuck is up with this!? We all know I cant have him, SO WHY THE FUCK IS HE CALLING ME!?!?!?! I understand that maybe he just wants to be friends but it doesnt make any fucking sense. We dont go to the same school, he lives 7 miles away, and I have no reason to go to the lower valley, except to see Liz. I cant take this!

My friend Jasmine invited me to her quince, I never knew how much she loved me. I love her a lot also. I hope I never have to leave her. Im gonna make Jon go with me so she can meet him. Nothing is gonna happend between us, So I hope she doesnt expect anything to happen. Now that she know's about me and she still loves me either way, I will stay behind her no matter what. I cant wait to see her in a dress.

I dont know what happened but, something possesed Jon to call me. I thought I would never hear from him again, Cuz I sure as hell wasnt gonna call him. I dont really like him anymore cuz of his stupid ass conflicts. But oh well. And yvette, Im not trying to kid myself, so dont even start.

genres don't really like you but you reach the
masses with your touching lyrics... Just
remember it isn't all about fame...

What Color is Your Heart?
brought to you by Quizilla
Lonliness dominates you. You can hide it well, but
its there, and your friends can see it. You
constantly feel alone, and need to do things to
fill your time. Your afraid to tell people
this, but sooner or later it gets out in a bad
way, and you think you screwed up everything.
And when you are in love is when you are sad
the most. (Please Vote)

What Emotion Dominates you?
brought to you by Quizilla
Love. You Truly Desire Love. You long for someone
to hold you and take the pain away. You haven't
been in much relationships or you need to work
on how to handle them. You always seem lost in
a daydream about the person you care about
most.

I dont know what to do with myself. Today sucks a fucking nut. Im getting pissed off that Liz is being hurt by Theresa. Asking someone to stop useing drugs is an act of love, and once again Theresa said "No." I hate for Liz to be let down like that. My uncle's are here from Kansas city. Now that everyone know's that Im "not straight" at Marrisa's. They offered me a shot of tequila yesterday and I turned it down. I might look like a pussy but it tastes like shit anyway. Besides Im Not trying to impress anyone. I dont know why but im not comfortable with my sexuality. I can tell my sister is trying to get it out of me. I hate dwelling in the past, just when I thought it was over, there was just much more to come. Im just gonna stop caring. Starting...NOW! Oh well. Some chick posted something on her journal. It really struck me when it said "marriage not about gender, its about love." Jon is lying to me about so much that it is becoming annoying. I never thought he would get annoying. Well there are other's out there. Jon is just out of my league for now.

Take the World of Darkness Quiz
by David J Rust

It takes a long while before you realize your errors in life. When you have someone that understands them its so much easier to get them out of your mind. The conversation I had last night with Yvette was so realistic. Unlike any conversation that I have ever had with anyone. Its good to know that a portion of my burdens were sent to hell, like my heart...ugh who am I kidding?

Liz is on the monitor now and I can't even talk to her, cuz her mom claims I am a "bad influence." Liz is going to cut and since i cant see her I cant stop her. She is being a bitch to everyone but the one causing the problem. I was talking to Jon all night and he made me feel so good. Unlike the way that Jenny makes Liz feel. He doesnt toy with my emotions, he tells me the truth about everything, all I have to do is ask. He told me we wouldnt stop talking and we will always keep in touch. All I can do is wish that he is telling me the truth. Liz is bringing me down from my good mood. Sometimes our bond can be mutualy beneficial, in this case its not. I abhor feeling depressed. This useless crying is so moronic. I want to cut so bad. ugh... fuck this...

I hate the fact that he doesnt want a committment. Everything that happened to him is in the past now, and nothing can be done about it. He needs to look past it. I want to tell him myself, but Im a fucking pussy. I dont want to live like this anymore. I dont crave sex, I just want to be with him. I have never felt this way about anyone. I know I have said this before but this time its defferent. I dont expect anyone to understand. Now that I cant talk to Liz I dont know who to tell. I know in the end this entire castle will crumble into sweet oblivion but until then, Adeiu.
